title: 6.22 Patch Release Date?
body: Will the 6.22 patch go live tomorrow (Nov 8)? Or will it go live on Nov 9?

replies.body:
I'm not sure, but you should see the announcement on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) when it's out.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Idk whats going on but icant see the text
i hope it will come 9 nov
I've been googling this since Saturday... hope someone lets us know
Ya I've been googling this too for a few days, but everybody says 9 Nov.
It's actually on 9 check out the surrender at 20 post.

> [{quoted}](name=PuppyGaming4,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=u0exrTxz,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-11-07T15:40:25.270+0000)
>
> Will the 6.22 patch go live tomorrow (Nov 8)? Or will it go live on Nov 9?

I think is on November 9 if i'm not mistaken.{{champion:245}}

they will tell you in the service status page (easy link on the side bar under boards feedback)

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na
